#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int t,N;
    int A[10000];
 
    unsigned long long int C,sum;
    cin>>t;
 
    while(t--)
    {
        int sum=0;
        cin>>N>>C;
        for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
        {
            cin>>A[i];
            sum=sum+A[i];
        }
        
        if(sum<=C)
            cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
            else
                cout<<"No"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
